about_the_game:
It's early in the morning and you're on your first train shift.
Gradually complete tasks and missions and become an experienced train driver.
Choose one of ten possible time periods and start your career as a train driver.
You will not need a license or knowledge of the complex rules of rail transport.
As a train driver, make sure that you meet the demanding requirements of passengers and freight companies.
Use the money to upgrade your fleet, which will allow you to meet even the most complex challenges on very demanding lines.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 5300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Locotier is a fully moddable Czech train game in which you can complete missions, try out trains from different time epoch, or just ride.
